TopicTitle: I lie background music in Astronaut Complex:-)

Articles.Content:
I am sure that this issue was raised several times, but I also have to throw in my two cents:D

The background music in really cool:D
Well "I lie" was in the title of this thread, so I cannot believe you
To tell the truth, I like that music too. Astronauts are cool, so they should always have cool music.

Well "I lie" was in the title of this thread, so I cannot believe you

Each can happen to forget one little letter:D

Each can happen to forget one little letter:D

Yea just teasing

I love the new music as well. It gives a very epic feel to choosing tech trees.
Is this some kind of reverse psychology?
Background music is not a lie. Cake is a lie.
The music is nice but after so many hours of listening to it, I turned it off. I now have my own music in the background.
I wish the game would drop into road trip rock music when roving; highway to hell, free falling or something like that.....the silence we have now is deafening.

playing oblivion soundtrack m83 in background is super epic mun flight ussualy moonflight has ended within an hour epic justkerbalthings like losing the count on landings and disasters.

sometimes i play rammstein or metallica but sometimes soft music like enya does good also
I like all the tunes, except that jazz xylophone number! I wish I could turn down the volume on only that tune!
